articles.title: Newborn stars set 'grand design' spiral galaxy aglow in stunning new photo - Space.com
articles.description: A new photo of NGC 4254, or Messier 99, was captured by the European Southern Observatory's Very Large Telescope. It is a grand design spiral galaxy, whose spiral arms wrap tightly around the galaxy's center.
articles.content:
The golden spiral arms of a distant galaxy sparkle in new images from the European Southern Observatory (ESO).
